title: Sheepless Nights (kids math cardgame)
description:
Sheepless Nights is an entertaining and educational (math) cardgame for kids (5+) and grownups.

- Available in English, German, French, Spanish, Russian, Dutch and Polish.

Get rid of your sheep cards first and win the game while learning to substract and add numbers.

Sheepless Nights help your kids improve the ability of count. Not only fun for kids but also for their parents. Sheepless Nights provides you the time playing together with your children and make good communication with them. If you want your child enjoy learning math, thereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s no other better choice except for Sheepless Nights.

A player can play two sheep cards at one time by calculating the value of the two cards in their hand and place them on the pile. Take advantage by playing a Lucky Lamb, the Shepherd and even the Big Bad Wolf... Watch out for a Black Sheep. They give you lots of points which you don't want!

4/5 review from askyourandroid.com:
5/5 review from appeggs.com:

Popular by players of UNO and Skip-Bo
